Introduction
Interested in the systematics and ecology of bark and ambrosia beetles (Curculionidae: Scolytinae, Platypodinae) and powder post beetles (Bostrichidae) worldwide. Currently working primarily on the xyleborine ambrosia beetles of East and South-East Asia, but several other projects in various states of completion.

Article
Full-text available

  • Roger Beaver
Forty-three species of Platypodinae are recorded from Laos, thirty-six for the first time in the country. There are five genera and thirty-eight species of Platypodini, three genera and five species of Tesserocerini. The following new synonymy is proposed: Peroplatypus laosi (Schedl 1971) (= Crossotarsus fagacearum Browne 1975 syn.nov.).

A new species of Xyloprista LESNE, 1901 with a key to its species
Article
Full-text available
  • Oct 2013
  • Liu Lan-Yu
  • Roger Beaver
A new species of Xyloprista LESNE 1901, X. longiscapus sp. n. is described from Jamaica. It can be recognized by the prolongation of the antennal scape well beyond the insertion of the remaining antennomeres, the glabrous elytra, and very strongly, coarsely punctured elytral declivity. A key is given to all five species of Xyloprista.
